飃字的基本解释

飃
piāo
同“飘”。

飃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piāo］
［《廣韻》撫招切，平宵，滂。］
［《廣韻》符霄切，平宵，並。］
“飘1”的繁体字。亦作“飃1”。
(1)疾风；旋风。
(2)风势迅疾貌。泛指迅疾。
(3)指风吹送、吹拂或吹落。
(4)泛指落，坠。
(5)指轻柔的物体在空间飞扬、浮动。
(6)指气味、声音等在空间弥漫扩散。
(7)谓发扬。
(8)飘泊；流浪。
(9)方言。轻率；不踏实。
(10)方言。谓禾苗光长叶子而不结子实。
(11)通“漂”。参见“飄决”、“飄溺”。
(12)戏剧用语。谓韵白不分轻重。

飃字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　飃； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1414第21
【集韻】匹妙切，音勡。風貌。或作?。　又【五音集韻】撫招切，音漂。旋風也。

飃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
飃字的起名意思

暂无。

Sing
Basic explanation of words
Sing
piāo
Same as "Gone with the Wind".
Sing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [piāo]
["Guang Yun" caress and cuts, flat night, stern. ]
["Guangyun" Fu Xiao cut, Ping Xiao, and. ]
"Piao 1" in traditional characters. Also known as "飃1".
(1) High wind; whirlwind.
(2) The wind is swift and rapid. Refers to swiftness in general.
(3) Refers to the wind blowing, blowing or blowing off.
(4) Generally refers to falling and falling.
(5) Refers to soft objects flying and floating in space.
(6) Refers to the diffuse diffusion of odors, sounds, etc. in space.
(7) It means to carry forward.
(8) Wandering; wandering.
(9) Dialects. Reckless; not at ease.
(10) Dialects. It is said that Hemiao grows leaves without bearing fruit.
(11) Through "drift". See "Drifting", "Drifting".
(12) Dramatic language. The rhyme white is irrelevant.
Sing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Fengzi Department】　飃; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1414-21
【Ji Yun】Miao cut, sound 勡. Style. Or for?.　[Five Tone Collection Rhyme] Caress and cuts, the sound drifts. The whirlwind also.
